and ( regexp_like(u.USER_NO, #{conditiions.searchName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) or regexp_like(u.USER_NAME, #{conditiions.searchName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) or regexp_like(u.JOB_NUM, #{conditiions.searchName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) or regexp_like(o.ORG_NAME, #{conditiions.searchName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) or regexp_like(o.ORG_ALIAS, #{conditiions.searchName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) or regexp_like(o.FQUN, #{conditiions.searchName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )
